#summary This page describes how the geoext-viewer could be used in the ESDIN project.

= Introduction =

NMCA's in ESDIN will be setting up View Services (WMS) and Download Services (WFS). These services will deliver content according to the INSPIRE data specification for Annex I themes, plus an additional data schema: ExM. From this perspective it is desirable that the geoext-viewer is aware of these themes.
